body_text: I didn't realize that route was coming from the router directly. I assumed that because this wasn't a connected component that it wasn't at the top level, but I guess I was wrong.
body: I didn't realize that `route` was coming from the router directly. I assumed that because this wasn't a connected component that it wasn't at the top level, but I guess I was wrong.
